00040 #ifndef _uilinelist_cpp
00041 #define _uilinelist_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "uilinelist.h"
00044 #include "uimanager.h"
00045 #include "uilayer.h"
00046 #include "world.h"
00047 
00048 #include "internalGorilla.h.cpp"
00049 
00050 namespace phys
00051 {
00052     namespace UI
00053     {
00054         LineList::LineList(UILayer* Layer)
00055             : Parent(Layer)
00056         {
00057             Manager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetUIManager();
00058 
00059             GLineList = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createLineList();
00060         }
00061 
00062         LineList::~LineList()
00063         {
00064             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyLineList(GLineList);
00065         }
00066 
00067         void LineList::SetVisible(bool Visible)
00068         {
00069             GLineList->SetVisible(Visible);
00070         }
00071 
00072         bool LineList::IsVisible()
00073         {
00074             return GLineList->IsVisible();
00075         }
00076 
00077         void LineList::Show()
00078         {
00079             GLineList->Show();
00080         }
00081 
00082         void LineList::Hide()
00083         {
00084             GLineList->Hide();
00085         }
00086 
00087         void LineList::Begin(Whole Thickness, ColourValue& Colour)
00088         {
00089             GLineList->begin((Real)Thickness, Colour.GetOgreColourValue());
00090         }
00091 
00092         void LineList::AddPoint(Real X, Real Y)
00093         {
00094             AddPoint(Vector2(X,Y));
00095         }
00096 
00097         void LineList::AddPoint(Vector2 Position)
00098         {
00099             GLineList->position((Position * Manager->GetWindowDimensions()).GetOgreVector2());
00100         }
00101 
00102         void LineList::AddActualPoint(Real X, Real Y)
00103         {
00104             AddActualPoint(Vector2(X,Y));
00105         }
00106 
00107         void LineList::AddActualPoint(Vector2 Position)
00108         {
00109             GLineList->position(Position.GetOgreVector2());
00110         }
00111 
00112         void LineList::End(bool Closed)
00113         {
00114             GLineList->end(Closed);
00115         }
00116 
00117         void LineList::SetRenderPriority(UI::RenderPriority Priority)
00118         {
00119             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP;
00120             switch(Priority)
00121             {
00122                 case UI::RP_Low:
00123                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Low;
00124                     break;
00125                 case UI::RP_Medium:
00126                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Medium;
00127                     break;
00128                 case UI::RP_High:
00129                     RP = Gorilla::RP_High;
00130                     break;
00131                 default:
00132                     break;
00133             }
00134             GLineList->RenderPriority(RP);
00135         }
00136 
00137         UI::RenderPriority LineList::GetRenderPriority()
00138         {
00139             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP = this->GLineList->RenderPriority();
00140             switch(RP)
00141             {
00142                 case Gorilla::RP_Low:
00143                     return UI::RP_Low;
00144                     break;
00145                 case Gorilla::RP_Medium:
00146                     return UI::RP_Medium;
00147                     break;
00148                 case Gorilla::RP_High:
00149                     return UI::RP_High;
00150                     break;
00151                 default:
00152                     break;
00153             }
00154             return UI::RP_Medium;
00155         }
00156     }//UI
00157 }//phys
00158 
00159 #endif
